thread.title: Nainggolan not keen on PL move
thread.title_full: Nainggolan not keen on PL move

title: Nainggolan not keen on PL move
text:
Radja Nainggolan happy at Roma amid Chelsea speculation By PA Sport Last Updated: 21/03/17 12:32pm Radja Nainggolan has been in fine form this season for Roma Radja Nainggolan insists he is happy at Roma and not interested in moving to the Premier League. 
The midfielder, currently on international duty with Belgium, has become one of Europe's hottest properties after scoring 12 goals this term to propel Roma to second in Serie A. 
Sky sources reported Chelsea's interest in Nainggolan last year , but he stayed in Italy and the 28-year-old has again played down speculation linking him with a move to England. Upgrade to Sky Sports now and get 12 months for just Â£18 per month! 
"In Rome I'm fine," Nainggolan told gazzetta.it . "My family is happy and even the weather is often good. 
"Sometimes you make choices for the money, others for the quality of life, which matters a lot to me. Also, if I went to England, I would have to start from scratch, but I repeat: I am very well in Rome. 
"China? Currently no, but you can never say never. We need to see right now."
